item.description:
FOR THOSE ABOUT TO PRESENT, WE SALUTE YOU!

Do you want to participate in leading a workshop, user group or giving a presentation or collaborating on a presentation?

Then come to our planning meeting where we can hash out ideas and schedule upcoming events.
The meeting will at Jacque's house near Joes Pizza- I will email the address to people who rsvp.

Put in rsvp what you want to volunteer for or if you can't make it but want a specific topic.
Also you can contact me directly if you want to schedule something and bypass planning mtg.
mtg will be held at one of our houses centrally located near downtown - and people are welcome to bring a yummy snacky thing.

Its good to have more than one person present on the same topic or to gear the whole presentation for a specific skill level or to have a series of two presentations, beginner and advanced..

Here is the list of past requests and volunteering:
#Requested: how to use tools in illustrator workshop, creating logos and working with pen tools
#Requested: Mood boards - jaque, Scott?
#copyright issues and images
#content strategy
# Conceptual Intro to CSS
Requested: # PHP- Intro, intermediate, and advanced.. PHP and CMS.. - Bob
# Meeting Accessibility Standards

# Interface design principles
# masks and hue in photoshop
# Flash
# Final Cut Pro- Hands-on workshop


# Design Theory and Application (from people with background in print design would be great!)
#Basics of In-Design
#slicing images for the web - Eric
#autotrace feature (Illustrator)
#automate feature in photoshop

#Pen tool in Photoshop and illustrator - Jaque and Lisa
#Pros and cons of CMS systems (Joomla vs. Wordpress
#How to Design an add or Brochure
#How to manage an e-commerce site - Jaque
#Magenta

#introduction to the world of PHP - Bob
#Fremiuim type business models- Jon Reed
#Intro to digital photography- Peter (Maybe)
#What I learned about Wordpress by building my own website - Tom Murray


#dedicated Server use- craig
#History of search engines and SEO- Craig
#Web Marketing-craig
#AddSense and Add words-craig
#value of visitors and advertisers - craig

#systems for file organization
#Billing - by task, hour or value? - David Caputo
#How to Design Proposals - David Caputo
#Organic SEO- David Caputo
#Dreamweaver CS3
#Expression Engine
